issue.title: [Rust] Remove memory_pool.rs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A while back we approved a PR to add a custom memory pool but it isn't actually used. Rust has other mechanisms now for specifying custom memory allocators so I think we should remove this unused code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3375?focusedCommentId=16633634) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2669
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2669>
